about_the_game:
Do you want to complete Burning Horns getting all short paths as well as having all images in HD resolution in your pocket?



This DLC contains a guide with all the detailed information you need to complete the whole game. Also, it contains all NSFW scenes of "Burning Horns: A Bara Isekai JRPG". In other words, by buying this DLC, you'll get:

  • A Walkthrough Document;
  • 8 Adult Scenes totalizing 35 lewd frames;

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Burning Horns\Adult Art Pack + Guide

content_descriptors.notes: Burning Horns: Adult Art Pack + Guide contains partial and full nudity, explicit male homosexual sex (oral and anal).
